import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Container, Row, Col, Button, Jumbotron } from 'react-bootstrap' const CreateScreen = () => { const [post, setPost] = useState({ title: '', body: '', }) const { title, body } = post const onChange = (e) => setPost({ ...post, [e.target.title]: e.target.body }) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setPost({ title: '', body: '', }) } return (

Create Post
) } export default CreateScreen
